feed.title: Openchangelog Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Openchangelog: v0.1.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow retrieving changelogs by full domain by @JonasHiltl in https://github.com/JonasHiltl/openchangelog/pull/4

entry.title: New release for Openchangelog: v0.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add dark mode + fix logo centering bug by @sergi0g in https://github.com/JonasHiltl/openchangelog/pull/5

New Contributors

  • @sergi0g made their first contribution in https://github.com/JonasHiltl/openchangelog/pull/5

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JonasHiltl/openchangelog/compare/v0.1.2...v0.1.3

entry.title: New release for Openchangelog: v0.1.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve optional values by @JonasHiltl in https://github.com/JonasHiltl/openchangelog/pull/8

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JonasHiltl/openchangelog/compare/v0.1.3...v0.1.4

entry.title: New release for Openchangelog: v0.1.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add contribution guidelines by @JonasHiltl in https://github.com/JonasHiltl/openchangelog/pull/10
  • Configurable Color Scheme by @JonasHiltl in https://github.com/JonasHiltl/openchangelog/pull/11

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JonasHiltl/openchangelog/compare/v0.1.4...v0.1.5

entry.title: New release for Openchangelog: v0.1.6
entry.content: Patch release to add versioning to base.css file. Without it the browser might cache it even if a new version exists on the server.
